text: Dirceu José Pinto (10 September 1980 – 1 April 2020) was a Brazilian Paralympic boccia player. He had muscular dystrophy. He won an individual and pairs gold medals at the 2008 and 2012 Paralympics in the BC4 category.PINTO Dirceu . Ipc.infostradasports.com. Retrieved on 2016-08-17.Dirceu Jose Pinto. London 2012.
